descriptions.overview: Rubberific shredded rubber mulch stands alone as the industry's hallmark recycled rubber mulch. This realistically textured groundcover looks identical to wood mulch and is made from 100% recycled rubber. Rubberific shredded rubber mulch will not fade, rot, compress or lose its original beauty even after years of exposure to the elements.
list: Rubber mulch preserves ground moisture and prevents weed growth, keeping plants healthy
Dark brown color is guaranteed to last for 12 years, eliminating the need to reapply mulch annually
Shredded texture resembles real wood and will not fade, rot, compress or lose its original beauty, even when exposed to harsh weather
Will not attract termites, carpenter ants or other damaging insects, keeping your landscape healthy and protected
0.8-cu ft bag covers 4.8-sq ft at 2-in depth, or 9.6-sq ft at 1-in depth
Non-toxic and IPEMA certified for safe use on playgrounds
Covers 9.6 square feet at a 1-inch depth

specs.title: Bag Capacity Quantity by Dry Volume

reviews.title: "Great Mulch for great landscaping!"
reviews.text: I tore out my old landscaping ...plants, Lava rock, edging stones and started from scratch. I purchased practically all my materials from Lowes including the Rubberific Black Mulch. While it is not the cheapest option, it is the best option! It looks great, keeps insects away, easily applies and I won't have to re-mulch for years to come! I am pleased with it and highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Jack

reviews.title: "Looks great, plants seem to love it"
reviews.text: I really like the benefits of rubber mulch. Over the last couple of years I've purchased two huge truckloads of rubber mulch from Lowe's (delivered in a tractor-trailer from out of state). Not only looks great, but keeps weeds and insects out and doesn't wash away, as well as providing somewhat of a "greenhouse" effect of keeping the soil from drying out. I recently needed a couple of extra bags, which I was able to buy in Lowe's garden shop, rather than order a truckload (which comes in many individual 40 lb. bags). I have learned that to do it right you MUST put it down in a two or three inch depth. My young Japanese gardens are thriving and growing beautifully.
reviews.author: MamaPita

reviews.title: "What a change for my flowerbeds"
reviews.text: Although, I've only had the black rubber mulch down for a couple of weeks, it seems to hold it's dark color very well. The flower beds get full sunlight most of the day, and all of the plants look really vibrant against the black background. There is no "gray or brown" in this mulch. It's not as heavy as regular mulch, which was surprising, and it has a sort of "chunky" look to it when it is spread. All in all, for the short amount of time I've had mine, I'm very pleased with the look. As far as cost, it was more expensive than regular mulch, but if it continues to hold up and look as clean as it does so far, I have no problem with the price.
reviews.author: GeeeeeG

reviews.title: "Perfect for No Maintenance"
reviews.text: I have had five back surgeries, so I was looking for something cheap enough, and something that didn't need to be replaced or supplemented each year. This works perfect, no decaying, no blowing around, rodent free, no mildew or mold, and no fading. I want everything I can to be maintenance free outside, and this makes my mulching maintenance free. Once and done..
reviews.author: journeyleft

reviews.title: "Soft"
reviews.text: I used this to mulch the walking area between my deck and garage door (for those quick trips to haul trash out where ya don't grab shoes). The area was also kind of overrun with weeds. It is very soft to walk on, even barefoot. It has rained hard several times since laying it down and so far so good with staying put. I've spotted a stray weed or two but not nearly what I had.
reviews.author: srtasuiza

reviews.title: "Shredded Rubber Mulch - Perfect for my situation!"
reviews.text: I have a flower bed in front of my house that I want to always look great but I don't want plants or weeds coming up in it. In the past, I used a chunky rubber mulch. Imagine my surprise when I discovered a shredded rubber mulch that looks just like wood mulch! This bag was light enough for me to easily carry. It spread quickly and easily, looks like wood and I won't have to worry with replacing it every year.Although the cost per bag is considerably more than wood mulch, when you factor in that you are not replacing it every year due to discoloring or deterioration, it is a great value. And....it does not attract termites!
reviews.author: Mesmereyes

reviews.title: "Great product - be prepared to buy extra bags"
reviews.text: This really is a great product. The color looks great and it does everything it says it will. It does look like real mulch. It spreads well, too. There is a slight rubber smell when you first apply it, which is to be expected. Keep in mind this is an investment product. Don't go by Lowes' specifications for a coverage guideline. We went with that and bought 30 bags and ended up having to buy 50 more to finish the area shown in the picture I'm attaching. The area covered in this photo is 30 bags of mulch covering landscapes fabric. I would suggest using the guidelines on the back and doubling it - particularly if you're laying over landscape fabric. Nonetheless, this truly is a GREAT product! My yard looks great year around, there are no fly away pieces like you see with wood mulch, and I don't need to reapply every year!
reviews.author: Geniphee

reviews.title: "Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: I was really excited about this product after reading all of the reviews. I think I may have set my expectations a little high. The mulch is very light weight which made for a very fast and easy install. I really like the idea of not having to replace the mulch every year and the idea of being maintenance free. Upon install, I noticed a few pieces of the rope of the tire, even found a piece of steel. After laying 13 bags, I picked out about a handful of trash. Not a ton, but still worth noting. I did not notice a smell as other reviews have mentioned. I purchased the brown mulch and to me it almost looks black. It is a little darker then I would have liked, but it does provide a nice contrast. Lastly, a few bags had a white residue on them, it seemed to wipe off so I'm hopefully that it will clean off with the first rain. Overall I would purchase the mulch again, I just wish it was a little cheaper.
reviews.author: Timmeme

reviews.text: Just bought this mulch after much debate. It seems the objections that some have (from internet searched) are unfounded, at least at this point. I love, love, love how this stuff looks. We looked at other brands and they looked chunky and cheap, but this stuff looks very real. We had tropical storm Irene just go through and the mulch didn't budge in the rain or wind. It only took an 1 1/2" to cover over black landscaping fabric, and stays put. It has a ever so slight rubber smell, but mostly disapates after a day or so. The cost was the only issue, but now I know I'm done mulching for years. I don't have to mess with the front of the house again! Looks so good : )
reviews.author: yardman

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: I first purchased the home depot Vigoro brand- it was $6.97 per bag. The quality was OK-good, too much fuzz and noticeable tire belts shredded in each bag. I wanted this product, but it was out of stock. I was lucky, they just received a delivery, one pallet, so I bought 10 bags. Not cheap at 9.99 a bag, but much better than the Vigoro product. This stuff is excellent. I should have bought more bags, I looked on line later the same day  and the entire pallet is gone. I replaced wood mulch, which breeds ants, and also fades after a short time. The wood turns rotten white etc. Never again. This stuff should last many years. Go buy it.
reviews.author: GardenBed

reviews.title: "Better than "RePlay" for PLAYGROUNDS"
reviews.text: My husband and I went through three different types of mulches for our children's play area before we finally found this. Mulches like the "replay" that they recommend for playgrounds are CHUNKY. And when they dry from the elements, they get HARD...not good for bare feet! We happened to find this by accident, (it was close to the replay which we almost got) and a bag of this happened to be open. It is rubber mulch in tiny slivers, not chunks. Therefore, when it dried, it didn't hurt my boys' feet!! GET THIS for you play areas! I also landscape and will most likely use this eventually to switch-out my bark.
reviews.author: squareroundpeg

reviews.title: "Looks like real brown mulch"
reviews.text: I wanted rubber mulch because my dogs kept burning my lawn when they went "peepeesoutside?" So I made an area special for them. It took them a little bit to get used to it but after a couple of days they are watering down the rubber mulch and not my lawn. no discoloration from their bathroom yet. looks like mulch and doesnt have the strings you find in other, less quality, rubber mulch. It does have a maroon hue to it and looks really nice. If it wasn't so expensive this would go around every park of my yard as well. Total area was a quarter circle about 16ft radius. I had to buy around 35 bags to get about 2-3in depth. Now I'm trying to figure out how to keep it all from leaving the area so as to not spend an additional $10 per bag for filler.
reviews.author: tylerdhurst

reviews.title: "BUY THIS!"
reviews.text: I have told so many people about this product. It is fabulous. I got the red and the color is vibrant and beautiful! It spreads like a dream WITHOUT a rake. You simply pour it out and spread it with your hands. Well, at least I did as it was being used in a border. The only con that I could possibly mention is that your car has a rubber smell while it's being transported but it does not linger. This is going to be such a time saver for me and it's great that it is helping the environment. It has great cushion underfoot too.
reviews.author: Kirby1036152003

reviews.title: "Rubberlific rubber mulch"
reviews.text: I would say this is the Cadillac of rubber mulch for landscape use. The shredded material does look quite like black-colored wood and it's uniform. The color has held well with no bleeding which is important since it was used for walking paths for our dogs. I haven't noticed any metal artifacts which seems to be a problem with cheaper products. The one negative is the cost. It's substantially higher than nugget-size products which is an issue if buying in bulk. Considering you are getting .80 cubic feet expect a major financial investment. Long-term it's a savings from decomposable products which have to be renewed annually.
reviews.author: DGonz

reviews.title: "Soft and Pretty"
reviews.text: We purchased this for our playset area and it works so well! Very pleased. The color is beautiful and contrasts well with everything else we have in our yard. The rubber is so soft and never really smelled too bad. We purchased 60 bags. I did my research and this was the best rated but most pricey. it's safe for the kids so the price was worth it. glad we went with this brand!
reviews.author: KaylaMessies

reviews.title: "Outstanding!  So much better than wood mulch!"
reviews.text: Love this rubber shredded mulch.  I am really tired of the expense and the work involved adding mulch to my gardens every year just to watch it disintegrate and then I have to do it all over again.  I decided to try this mulch and it is great.  I don't get nearly the weeds growing through like I did in wood mulch and it looks EXACTLY like black wood mulch.  Unless you stare at it and poke through it, no one will know.  It does have a smell to it at first but that fades.  I'll take the slight smell any day over the work of mulching every year.  Looking forward to not spending my Spring laying mulch any more.
reviews.author: Landerson

reviews.title: "Worth every penny!"
reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these rubber "wood chips" (like, over 100 bags) to put in an area by our pool. For bare feet running around, now we can have the look of real wood chips but be soft and springy on your toes. The bags don't cover much surface area (then again, we put down several inches since it's a high traffic area), but the bags themselves are very light to carry. Plus the color won't fade for like 12 years! For the price, ease to spread, soft on bare feet OH and did I mention that even when you're face first in these they totally look like real wood... SO worth the extra cost compared to real wood chips!
reviews.author: perkyshrew

reviews.title: "So EASY to Spread"
reviews.text: I saw the product on line and decided to go have a look see at the store--I am SO GLAD I did!! It was on sale for a bit over $7.00! Bought enough bags to do my entire front garden and it looks SPECTACULAR.I am a 72 year old grandma and I unloaded my PT Cruiser myself, carried the bags to the flower beds and spread it myself. It can be spread quite easily by hand. I stood back and looked at the fruits of my labor and SMILED! I am sick to death of replacing ugly, faded mulch every year-this seemed like the solution. It WAS!Highly recommend
reviews.author: BonnieP

reviews.title: "One of my best investments!"
reviews.text: I love this product because it lasts for a long time and makes my landscape look lovely. Plus, with regular bark, I've constantly had the problem of cats using the bark as their litter box. They stay clear of the rubber mulch. I will definitely buy more, and recommend it.
reviews.author: Lady_Bijan

reviews.title: "Never Again!!!!"
reviews.text: NEVER, AND I MEAN NEVER, will I go back to buying wood mulch. This is the best mulch in the creation of mulch. It looks like wood mulch but sooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much better. My neighbors are already jealous because they have to re-mulch next year. I won't have to re-mulch until around the summer my 5-yr old graduates high school. This is the new product to have in your landscaping projects. Now I can sip on lemonade in my hammock watching my neighbors next summer re-mulching their front and back. Cheers!
reviews.author: MD DIYer

reviews.title: "not recommended for garden with bulbs in Spring!"
reviews.text: I agree with above reviews for color and stability.  I put the rubber mulch down last year so one year old in my front garden. My beautiful crocus are not able to push up through it! The mulch is in large chunks now. I have 100's of crocus. I'm going to need to remove all of the mulch to replace with wood mulch. I like the rubber mulch for color retention and stability.  It does not give any nutrients by breaking down. So now my opinion now that I used to have used both-Rubber  and Wood. They both have their benefits for certain types of gardens. On my hillside where I don't want the wind to blow the mulch off will be perfect for rubber mulch.
reviews.author: L

reviews.title: "Definately worth the cost"
reviews.text: My girlfriend has allergies, so I had to be careful about the type of mulch I put into our new flowerbeds. After researching and reading reviews, I chose this product for it's positive qualities (inhibits mold spore growth, ease of use, long lasting, no need to re-mulch yearly) The mulch came in .8 cubic foot bags which were easy to handle and were actually pretty light. We spread it around easily. There is a little rubber smell, but no where near what I was expecting. The price is expensive, compared to regular mulch, but overall, I am very pleased with this product. Definitely worth it.
reviews.author: Marty1517

reviews.title: "Who Knew Mulch Could Bring a Smile to My Face?!"
reviews.text: I has seen a friend putting this type of mulch down last year and I questioned him at the time as to what type of mulch it was as it looked fantastic. When he told me rubber mulch, I was surprised and curious as I had never heard of it. I have seen his beds looking consistently fantastic now for about a year with no fading or remulching required.I decided to make the investment this year and I'm so glad I did. Our yard looks fantastic! The product is guaranteed not to fade or disintegrate for 10-12 years!! No mulching for me until all my kids are off to college!!!
reviews.author: ShellyK

reviews.title: "Great buy"
reviews.text: I first bought this three years ago for the landscape in back. I heard that it takes less rubber mulch than wood mulch to cover an area, doesn't erode like wood, and holds color. I LOVE this product. I bought more this year to start the front landscape. The mulch I put down three years ago that has been in the Nebraska weather elements looks just like the brand new mulch I put down. Price is kind of high but you figure the life of the product will actually make it a better buy than replacing wood mulch yearly. I also like the idea that I am doing a part to help recycle old tires. Neighbors were amazed when I told them it was rubber and they couldn't tell from the looks. I have some delicate plants in my landscape and it doesn't bother them at all. Highly recommend to everyone!
reviews.author: kathylene

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: I had regular mulch for about 6 months before got contaminated with fungus. The worst one artillery fungus. There were spores all over my house. So we decided to remove all the mulch from the yard and replace it with this Red Rubber Mulch. Removing the old mulch was hard work for a disabled person like me. It cost me a lot of pain. But this rubber product lucks like the real thing. It is very light and easy to handle. It is warranted to stay red for about 15 years. So it may be the last mulch I have to buy.
reviews.author: Sam

reviews.title: "GREAT"
reviews.text: This looks so real. I love the look & feel. Mostly I look forward to not having to mulch every year. My friends have already seen it and they have made the same purchase for their yards. Pricey for size of bag but worth it in the long run.
reviews.author: GEM1

reviews.title: "Once and done!"
reviews.text: If the color of this mulch lasts as long as they say (12 years!) I plan on it being the last mulch I lay down in my lifetime ( I foresee myself not caring that much about mulch past a certain age). Every year, the dreaded chore of mulching comes to visit and I just got sick of it. This stuff looks real, keeps the weeds down and retains its color. It's lightweight too so no more hauling out the wheelbarrow to transport multiple bags. The only tough pill to swallow is the price, almost $10/bag. That's pricey but it's worth it to me in the end to only do it once.
reviews.author: Marbean

reviews.title: "Excellent Prodcut!"
reviews.text: Normally, I do not write reviews, but I must say this is a good product. If you have the extra dollars to spend, go for this instead of the wood mulch. It looks absolutely gorgeous and accents our landscape lighting perfectly. You can't tell the difference whether it is rubber or wood and already received a few compliments. Even had a few bags left over from what I originally calculated! Surely, best bang for your buck and since I am a busy individual, this is a one and done deal since seasonal mulchings are now eliminated.
reviews.author: Maryland guy

reviews.title: "not recommended for garden with bulbs in Spring!"
reviews.text: I agree with above reviews for color and stability.  I put the rubber mulch down last year so one year old in my front garden. My beautiful crocus are not able to push up through it! The mulch is in large chunks now. I have 100's of crocus. I'm going to need to remove all of the mulch to replace with wood mulch. I like the rubber mulch for color retention and stability.  It does not give any nutrients by breaking down. So now my opinion now that I used to have used both-Rubber  and Wood. They both have their benefits for certain types of gardens. On my hillside where I don't want the wind to blow the mulch off will be perfect for rubber mulch.
reviews.author: L

reviews.title: "Love this!"
reviews.text: Read the reviews & decided to try it. Awesome..looks like regular mulch!
reviews.author: Jr

reviews.title: "Just the touch I needed!"
reviews.text: I have a new home that has a boring flowerbed, this product brought out the added touch I needed to make it POP. All that is left for me to do is to return to Lowe's for some flowers to finish the project.
reviews.author: TrishB

reviews.title: "cig butt in bag"
reviews.text: Why would there be nasty cig butts in the first 9 dollar bag i opened that is nasty , but on my second rose bush the mulcj looks good so far, so sort of balls in bag also
reviews.author: bryan

reviews.title: "Windproof"
reviews.text: We bought this for several areas around the house and patio. Two winters now for some areas and it is still the same color and we have not had to even "touch up" after the winter winds and snows. Initial price is high, but overall after 2-3 years you come out ahead since we don't have to replace wore out, wind blown bare sections year after year like we did with the traditional mulch. Will be finishing our last large area this year with rubber mulch.

reviews.title: "looks great, easy to use."
reviews.text: looks great, easy to use. I would recommend to friends.
reviews.author: Colbert

reviews.title: "Black Shredded Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: WE have had an insect problem in the past, where the insects were contained in the mulch we put on the flowerbeds around the house. This mulch does the same job of retaining soil and moisture without the insect problem associated with other, natural mulches. The color should last a long time as the rubber looks like shredded tires, and they are usually black throughout.
reviews.author: dbj9171

reviews.title: "Brown Color now has red hue"
reviews.text:
We have used a rather large amount of this for our previous home in San Francisco, as well as current home in San Juan Capistrano.

We have been buying the finely shredded dark brown to cover our various landscaping projects. Only to find out when we went to buy more this past week-end, the color has changed!! It now has a slight red hue in it, not to mention it appears Lowe's is not carrying the finely shredded version any longer. So now our yard is starting to look odd because of the different colors and textures now.

It's a product that no one else carries, so we are stuck.
reviews.author: sfwolf13

reviews.title: "Looks Great"
reviews.text: I bought the black mulch and it looks like real mulch. I don't think anyone could tell the difference unless you told them. However my only complaint is for spending $9.97 a bag, you'd think quality control would be a little better I had at least 3 bags that had 12" pieces of unshredded tires in them with the occasional piece of trash or wood chips. I know it's hard since it's recycled material so I can pick out the trash(which wasn't much) but the 12" strip of tire shouldn't have been in there. Other than that, color looks great and the cut looks great.
reviews.author: Angel

reviews.title: "Looks great"
reviews.text: Looks great and was easy to put down. We used it for the ground underneath of an inflatable hot tub. Very happy with it!
reviews.author: Natalie

reviews.title: "Worth the extra $$"
reviews.text: When all of your neighbors' non-rubber mulch begins to fade only weeks into the season, yours will look just like the day you poured it out of the bag. Looks just like the real thing, especially right after a good rain. I plan to never go back to wood mulch again. This is the best brand, too. We have tried other brands, but none of them have that shredded mulch look. The other ones look fake.
reviews.author: nickname55

reviews.title: "Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: I love it, the rain does not move it nor does the color change. It is as black as the first day we put it down. It's well worth the money
reviews.author: Leslie

reviews.title: "Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: I found the rubber mulch very friendly for usage in my front yard. The color is amazing and was very easily managed.
reviews.author: Turner

reviews.title: "Fantastic product!"
reviews.text: I bought about 50 bags about 5 or 6 years ago, same brand. It still looks beautiful. I decided to rake it out this year to pull the bottom mulch pieces to the top and you can barely notice a color difference. You would have to stare at it for a little bit before you might even notice it. It's definitely not something I would complain about though. I like that the bags are much lighter to lift and move around. I'm not getting any younger. It saves me a lot of grief and back pain to use this type of mulch instead of the the wood mulch. I love to garden and the more I can do by myself, the happier I am. The cost is high, but what isn't these days. It's still cheaper all the way around though. Less time spent going to the store every year to break your back remulching the yard. I think it retains the ground moisture better than wood mulch too. My plants love this stuff!!! Even in the several weeks of 100 degree weather this summer, my plants did fantastic. The few small areas of wood mulched plants weren't happy at all with the heat.
reviews.author: Cydd

reviews.title: "So real looking, serious gardeners were fooled!"
reviews.text: Used this rubber mulch on my sons new construction home.  Instantly transformed the space... wow, what curb appeal!  This is so real looking, even the family's serious gardeners had no idea it was rubber.  No real rubber smell and the color was rich brown, very organic looking.  The only concern we had was the cost, ( we didn't realize how many bags we would need)  but since it should prevent remulching ... we feel it will save in the long run on â€” time, money, and labor!
reviews.author: Amma

reviews.title: "red rubber mulch is awesom"
reviews.text: it took me years to finally decide that im so sick and done with weeds at my age of almost 68.  I can't depend on anyone person to help me.  so I went to Lowes after looking on this stie and bought 54 bags of this stuff and it works.  you can smell the rubber though so i might buy a few real bags of mulch to drown out the smell.  but over all it sure looks pretty and it goes on so nicely.  i can pick these bags up and take them bage after bag to my area and put them out there over top of weed barrier and a little composting dirt.   ive decided that the grass in front is going to and im going for fake grass next.
reviews.author: peggie

reviews.title: "Rubber mulch"
reviews.text: I love the rubber mulch so far. I just put the mulch in my flower beds yesterday and love how it looks and how easy it is to handle. Only time will tell if I get my money worth out of it but if I do it was a great investment. The coverage is great. I will need to get a few more bags to cover the areas that I put on a little thin. I was running out of bags and wanted to prohibit any weed growth before I make another trip to the store. The bag gives you a coverage guide but I didn't know the measurements of the bed. I suggest knowing this information before buying to prevent return trips to finish your project.
reviews.author: Missy

reviews.title: "Great product, however"
reviews.text: Took the leap this year to replace wood mulch with this product. I like how it gives a perfect look to my flower beds. The weight of the bag was another factor for me, with a disc problem the wood mulch was too heavy to handle. My only complaint is that there was a lot of trash every bag I purchased. Old wrappers, paper tags, and even found a cigarette butt.  Every bag I purchased was sealed so I know this was not from a Lowe's customer or employee. You'd think for the price the manufacturer would take more pride in the final product.
reviews.author: Trus-mom

reviews.text: I have been using this rubber mulch for 3 years now, and love it. It stays in place, doesn't take moisture away from your plantings, and looks great. If you are gentle, you can actually rake leaves off the top of the mulch without disturbing it. Although the initial cost is considerably more than wood mulch, it's a value, because it last forever. Before using the rubber, I was adding more regular mulch every year.
reviews.author: PJQuilts

reviews.title: "Great Change"
reviews.text: We changed all of our flower beds from wood mulch to the rubber mulch and love it! No rot or bugs plus this is the second year for many of our beds and the color is still like brand new!
reviews.author: Lulubell

reviews.title: "Fantastic"
reviews.text: I bought 100 bags of the dark brown. It is expensive but well worth it. I got a Lowe's card to save 5%. As soon as I finish this review I am off to buy 50 more bags.It spreads farther, per bag, than I thought and it looks absolutely gorgeous. I tore out marble color terrace stone and have put in Arkansas creek rock as borders and walls. The mulch accents it perfectly. We decided the high initial cost was well worth it. we looked at bark mulch at other houses in the hood and it looks old and needs replaced. Mine will look great year after year.If you have the money for the initial outlay, you can't go wrong to buy it. I don't smell the rubber unless I spray water on it on one of these 100 degree days we have been having for the last month. The smell is slight and it dissipates rapidly.I purchased the mulch at the Joplin MO store, which missed the tornado by a couple of blocks.They are extremely busy now with the rebuild but were very helpful to me.
reviews.author: Constable

reviews.title: "Looks brand new year after year"
reviews.text: I've been converting over my mulch beds for a few years now. The one that I did first 3 years ago looks just like the one I've just completed. Its clean and much softer to kneel on to plant things, too. Yes, it is a bit on the pricy side but since it should last 12 years or so I'll come out way ahead.
reviews.author: dw99

reviews.text: I do not know how you can go wrong. A 12 yr warranty for color, added plus rubber will not decompose.As former user of wood mulch this is 100% better. So far really pleased with product.
reviews.author: Howie1

reviews.title: "RED RUBBER MULCH"
reviews.text: Just had this mulch delivered last week, and today is actually first nice day to start laying it.This mulch is GREAT!!! I can't stop laying it. It looks so real and really makes my back yard look great.I am covering all the areas that have dirt and can not wait till it rains and my dogs will not be dragging in all that mud.This is a great investment and well worth the price!
reviews.author: nora

reviews.title: "Love this stuff!"
reviews.text: This mulch looks great. It looks just as good if not better than the real thing! Only drawback is the price. I am hoping to offset the price by not having to buy mulch every year. Hopefully this will last several years. Having treated our house for termites we decided this was a good choice. When first put down has a smell like old tires but that goes away in a day or two. So far, great stuff!
reviews.author: BGeorge

reviews.title: "Taking a chance it lasts!"
reviews.text: Hopeful that it lasts as long as it says it will! If it does then it will be worth the extra money!! The bags don't cover much area even at a one inch depth. I've purchased about 45 bags so far for one of my flower beds that is about 17' x 15' (I think) and I still need more. So far I'm happy with it! Only been a few weeks. It spreads really fast and easy from the bag!! Which is nice compared to wood mulch. No strong odor. My cats seem to like laying on it so it must be soft?! The color is nice. I'm just hoping it lasts cause I'm tired of mulching every year!!
reviews.author: Haydensmom07

reviews.title: "Realistic Mulch Look"
reviews.text: This product looks more realistic than a previous brand whereas the tire pieces were large enough to see the tire. This one is more refined and looks less like RUBBER recycled. Very natural appearance. It has a rubbery smell the first few days but it soon leaves the product. The product is much lighter than carrying heavy mulch bags as well and more user friendly for persons that are elderly and or with back problems etc.
reviews.author: DarsAngel

reviews.text: Good option if you want to avoid bugs and avoid the annual chore of adding mulch. Only thing you need to consider when purchasing rubber mulch is that in the hot sun you will get a hint smell of rubber as it heats up.
reviews.author: TJ

reviews.title: "Works great, and doesn't float away!"
reviews.text: We used this mulch around the house flower beds, and it has worked very well so far. I was concerned about it floating away with a good rainstorm, but we have had several big rains this year and it has largely stayed put, much to our delight. We wanted to avoid using wood around the house as the wood mulch always seems to attract ants (and possibly termites). Only time will tell if the longevity is as good as claimed, but we are off to a great start. Definitely recommended!
reviews.author: Smitty

reviews.title: "Rubber mulch"
reviews.text: We decided to purchase rubber mulch this year and so glad we did. The mulch is lightweight and very easy to put down. We were concerned with the light weight it might float away with heavy rains but that was not the case. We also installed regular mulch in another area at  the same time and it already looks washed out but the rubber mulch looks great. Definitely a good investment that will last more than a year.
reviews.author: TD

reviews.title: "Full of "nits""
reviews.text: I've used rubber mulch before but not this shredded product. Aesthetically it is much better looking than the previous product with bigger chunks. However, almost every bag contains what I call "nits". Pieces of white plastic ucr labels, aluminum candy wrappers, cellulose products, etc. I find that totally unacceptable, considering the price of this product. I will continue to use the product as rubber mulch is now my standard. I'll never use wood again. Absent the "nits" I would give it four stars. Lower the price, or up the quantity, and it would be five stars.
reviews.author: RetiredLEO

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Buying more for my little girls playground.This stuff works great,is really soft and doesnt dissolve in time. Just mist it with water and it looks brand new.Thanks Lowes :)
reviews.author: Dayoffyardaholic

reviews.title: "Red Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: Covered our front yard-garden bed, when "Red" Rubber Mulch came to our Lowe's three years ago. Like the nuggets best, as they stay in place better than the shredded variety. We've had some significant storms in Oklahoma and was amazed how the product compressed and didn't float away. No decay and replacement each year. Leaves are removed with air blower. We are expanding use of this product to our back yard. Marked Value at 4 Stars, as Mulch is less expensive at WalMart.
reviews.author: Comments

reviews.title: "All I can say is WOW"
reviews.text: We had purchased this mulch two years ago and it is still going strong (need to add more as we are looking to make our flowers beds bigger)- looks just like the day we bought it and it makes weeding much easier than the traditinal wood mulch. It even fooled an experienced landscaper- he could not believe it was not "real" mulch. This product is well worth the investment!
reviews.author: Vicki

reviews.title: "Great Landscaping Material"
reviews.text: This product is great to use. I have 15 grandchildren that come over, most of them elementary age or younger. I don't have to worry about them getting splinters or anything if they venture into the yard anymore. It looks beautiful from the street. Regular mulch may be much cheaper, but this product is so much easier to use and easier on the hands and feet I wouldn't consider using anything else.
reviews.author: maggiemae

reviews.title: "Shredded Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: Love the product and without getting up close can't tell its not real mulch. However, cost was a bit excessive - $9.97/0.08 cu ft. The warranty states it will maintain its color for 12 years - will have to see. If it lasts more than 4 years it will have made up for the difference in cost to actual wood mulch.
reviews.author: TWM1

reviews.title: "I may become a convert"
reviews.text: For years I have been resistant to try rubber mulch products, however, the mulching of our fairly extensive garden beds has become a larger job than I care to annually undertake, so I decided to give this product a try in one of my more difficult sloped areas.  I am very pleased with the appearance, and the smell is not bothersome to me.  We did find an occasional piece of something other than shredded rubber mixed in, but that happens in wood mulch as well. We have had the product down for about 2 weeks, and I gave it five stars, BUT we have not had either very hot weather or a heavy rainstorm yet and I am still waiting to see how my plants do, and if there may be an unacceptable amount of washout from the rain.  I will update this review accordingly if so.
reviews.author: FlowerMom

reviews.title: "Awesome product!"
reviews.text: The rubber mulch is light, easy to use and last a lot longer then wood chips or bark. It doesn't attract bugs and helps keeps the weeds away. I really like the way it looks in my yard.
reviews.author: Gardengroupie

reviews.title: "Great mulch"
reviews.text: We live in an HOA community; all the shrubs planted in the front of our homes is mulched as part of our monthly fee.  This year, residents opted for black mulch which looks so sharp against the lush greens.  Any landscaping the owners do is their responsibility; and, getting on in years, we decided to purchase the shredded black rubber mulch.  We are hoping it will last for many years and retain its black color.  Reading some previous reviews, I hoped we didn't find too many large pieces.  We put down 10 bags and only found a few larger pieces...the rest of nicely shredded.  It was easy to apply.  Would recommend it to anyone considering rubber mulch.
reviews.author: AMRD

reviews.title: "Rubberific Shredded Black Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: I love the product and have been gradually (as I can afford it) replacing decaying cedar mulch for the past 6 years. The bags are lighter weight than wood mulch - easier to carry home from store and throughout garden.  Truly looks like wood (my garden club friends could not believe the product was rubber - they had to "feel" the mulch for proof).  The shrubs seem to love it and seem happier than those with wood mulch.  Best of all the product does not introduce:  weeds, fungi, insects, diseases into your garden as I have found wood mulch to do.
reviews.author: Acerlady

reviews.title: "Good, but with drawbacks"
reviews.text: We began using this product two years ago because we love the mulch look but without actually having mulch. We use the weed cloth under it. The one drawback is that as it get hot in the summer sun it tends to settle and stick together. Expect to have to continue to have to fluff it up and add more to it each year. And since it is far more expensive than regular mulch, that is a considerable expense.
reviews.author: CollegeDean

reviews.title: "Way better than wood mulch!"
reviews.text: I bought this stuff in place of wood mulch as I was tired of having to mulch my Shrub/flower beds every year.  I figure my return on investment will be about 2-3 years as long as it hold up well.  I will also save on my labor of having to add it every year.  So far it has looked great and can't even tell that it is rubber.  It seems to stay in place fairly well and as time goes on I expect it to lock in even more.  You will get a few pieces in each bag that aren't shredded but just put them at the bottom and cover them up.  The smell of rubber will dissipate after a few weeks at most but I enjoy the smell so it does not bother me. Seems like a great investment so far and I have no regrets.  It does look a lot better than the crumb rubber mulch.
reviews.author: Mightyquinn

reviews.title: "last time I'll ever buy wood mulch"
reviews.text: Lesson learned, you really do get what you pay for... Every year i â€œwaitâ€ for Scotts premium mulch to go on sale, then have them deliver a pallet to my home.   Lesson learned, its always a crap shoot what the premium mulch is going to look like, color fades, break my back ever year replacing, never again.  Rubberized mulch is the real bargain, its light wieght to handle, lays and covers much easier and more efficiently than traditional mich.  color and qyality always consistamt and remains that way, no more bugs, why did i wait all these years to switch? (Like most, the initial price difference kept me from buying thinking i could get get 4 bags traditional mulch on sale for price of one rubberized bag.  Big mistake, never again, make the investment one time trust me!!!
reviews.author: lkn-gardner

reviews.title: "Liked it, but it was a little vibrant"
reviews.text: It took not to much mulch to cover up the area, and it still looks great after two years!
reviews.author: Outdoorslover11

reviews.title: "I love this stuff!"
reviews.text: It's easy to handle and very durable, also fairly inexpensive! It looks new all the time. I'm also excited about the idea of not having to replace it year afer year and if I do, there is a 12 year warranty!
reviews.author: Innovativeme

reviews.title: "Clever Product"
reviews.text: While it has only been a few weeks since I put this rubber mulch down, I am very happy with it so far. You have to get up very close to tell it is rubber, and the smell of rubber dissipated within the day. I love the lightweight factor and that it handles pretty much just like regular mulch. I will be picking up one more bag to really fill my lawn and garden area.
reviews.author: Jackie

reviews.title: "Looks good, but expensive"
reviews.text: While it looks good and is easy to lay down, I was trying this in some places in my garden.  I'll admit, I didnt look closely at the cubic ft.  I had thought it would be about three times as much as the bags of regular mulch, but would last for so much longer it would be worth it.  It covers about half of a regular bag of mulch, so therefore is 6 times as expensive.  It looks good, but I cant afford that for much of my garden.
reviews.author: Happyhippie

reviews.title: "AWESOME!!!!"
reviews.text: Very easy to install. Just be sure to lay landscape fabric before hand.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.text: I want to compliment the associates at Lowes. I purchased 10 bags of rubber mulch to add to my yard. I lovethis mulch. It looks pretty as well as staying in place during heavy rain storms that Florida has beenhaving. It was a very hot hot day and I never had to touch the mulch till I got home with it. Lowesassociates went to the back picked it, put it on a cart, brought it to the front, then brought it outside whileI got the truck, then loaded the mulch into the truck. What a wonderful way to shop!
reviews.author: joanmaarie

reviews.title: "Rubberific Shredded Mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 75 bags of the brown shredded rubberific mulch and was disappointed at the amount of large unshredded pieces of rubber, paper, plastic, and even a cigarette butt I found in the bags. I think 10 of the 75 were debris free. It took more time picking out the trash than it did laying down the mulch. With that said, it looks great down and I still need about 25 more bags but I am hesitant to buy it due to all the debris. One would think that for 9.97 a bag the quality control would be top notch!!
reviews.author: Maria

reviews.title: "Great Product and keeps its color!"
reviews.text: I've used this mulch for ten years and it is great! It keeps its color and all that is needed is a little fluffing, a few bags added and it looks like new. I usually do this after winter is over. People always ask how we keep our mulch looking so nice and they never guess it is rubber. I've recently moved and now use at my new home.
reviews.author: Happy

reviews.title: "Love it !!!!!"
reviews.text: It looks great, lasts forever, keeps the weeds out, and helps keep our landfills from filling up.
reviews.author: joanie

reviews.title: "I love the look of the product"
reviews.text: I love the look of the product but I think it could be a lite cheaper than 10.00 a bag.
reviews.author: Kayy

reviews.text: I needed just a little more rubber mulch to complete a large project, and a "scoop" would be way too much, so this fit the bill. These are little bits whereas what I had been using were larger chunks, but it doesn't "kick" around as much as the large chunks.
reviews.author: sheash

reviews.title: "No Comparison"
reviews.text: When comparing to hardwood mulch, the rubber product is worth the extra money, Each spring you buy new wood mulch to redo the flower beds. Rubber mulch has a ten year color warranty, no chance of termites or other bugs. So, when doing the comparison on cost for ten years along with reducing termite infestation to your home's foundation, it's an easy decision. Rubber mulch bags are lighter and easier to handle.
reviews.author: wannabe

reviews.text: My gardens look fantastic!!! Great bang for my buck! Hasn't faded, stays put on windy days and hasn't washed away in heavy rain!! I will never buy "bark" mulch again and it will be years before I have to buy Ruberific again so well worth the $9.00 a bag
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Best rubber mulch available"
reviews.text: This is for landscape purposes. I challenge you to be able to tell it is rubber without touching. We went with the red and it looks great. It is very costly, but the color is guaranteed for 12 years. You won't have to mulch every year. If you want it for a playground, go with a cheaper brand. This is high quality landscape mulch.
reviews.author: James19

reviews.title: "Love this product"
reviews.text: Love this product, just wish it wasn't so expensive. Ordered ahead of pick up and had no problems getting it. Thank you,
reviews.author: Tammy CB

reviews.title: "Rubberific rubber mulch"
reviews.text: We just bought this mulch and put it down, so I am unable to comment on how it will keep its color over time. I have no reason to believe that it will not.It was quite easy to put down and stays put even in heavy winds. There were a few rather large pieces of rubber (2 or three and we bought 60 bags) but they were easily covered over by smaller pieces.As far as value, it cost more than regular mulch but should last for several years,.
reviews.author: iluvcocacola

reviews.title: "Ultimate Landscaping Beauty"
reviews.text: I thought that the bag was not going to cover as much as the regular mulch bags. When I put it down it filled in as much as a large bag of mulch and looks sensational! WOW!
reviews.author: TEDDY

reviews.title: "Brown shredded Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: I have used the rubber mulch for 10 years. I use it in the flower beds, that are next to the house. The color does not fade like regular mulch. It stays in place, even in heavy rains. Easy to put down and not messy like other mulch.
reviews.author: Nancy

reviews.title: "Great quality product"
reviews.text: I used this mulch for my children's playground. It is soft and perfect for that use. The quality of this rubber mulch is unmatched. I have used other rubber mulch products, and they were no where near as nice looking as this product is. My only complaint is that the price is quite high for such a small bag.
reviews.author: Zhayes

reviews.title: "New and improved"
reviews.text: Was tired of the old mulch losing color, blowing away, and having to be replaced every year (or more often). Looked up the reviews and decided to make the change. It's more expensive but after 6 months...I'm more than satisfied with the purchase. Easy to put down, looks great, and stays put. It has a much longer warranty but if it lasts 2 or more years, it's well worth the extra money!
reviews.author: WildBill

reviews.title: "Expensive, looks great!"
reviews.text: Love this mulch looks great, very expensive. Took 93-bags to cover my area, wish it came in the 2.0 cubic feet size. Brown color was way too dark, this red is awesome. Very easy to spread, bags stacked on pallet seem to require a rake to break up chunks caused from stacking at store. Otherwise easily raked into position.
reviews.author: ndtpage

reviews.title: "Good Product, Last a long time"
reviews.text: I tested this product in a small area, the expanded the area after testing it and liking it. The product does not degrade. Quality got a 4 star rating because the product did change color. I found the color got darker over the years of exposure to weather. This product also washed away from down spout areas. Near the down spout areas I replaced mulch with lava rock. I have areas around the that I have put this product and has not physically degraded in over two years. Some times I spread a thin layer over the old to refresh the color. Finally I noticed that when I used real wood mulch the real mulch got termites and disintegrated turning to dirt fast. When I replaced the old wood mulch I would have to dig out the old degraded wood and dirt to freshen up the wood mulch. This product did not get termites like real wood mulch does. A little pricy. however, I have not had to replace this mulch every year like I did when using wood mulch.
reviews.author: skidog

reviews.title: "Rubberific Mulch is long lasting"
reviews.text: Love this product. Not only is it long lasting, and fade resistant but it detours pests as well.  This product is excellent for landscaping any area and adds beautiful curb appeal. The Black really stands out and adds a special touch over your standard brown and red mulch colors. We have used this product at multiple properties and will continue to use in the future.
reviews.author: Carie

reviews.title: "Looks greats, easy"
reviews.text: Product looks great, easy to put down and definitely does not wash away. Has a odor but seems to be going away, nothing crazy. lets hope it last for as long as they say. so far looks great and most people cannot tell its fake.
reviews.author: Jcstnzo

reviews.title: "Very pleased with the Rubberific Mulch"
reviews.text: We researched this rubber mulch after a friend told us how pleased she was with her purchase. We bought one bag initially, as we were skeptical, to see exactly what it looked, felt, and smelled like!  We went back and bought 80 bags (calculated according to bag instructions) and did cringe at the cost!  However we are very pleased with the look of the mulch.  We bought the dark brown, and it looks rich and contrasts very nicely with the shrubs and flowers.  After apply the mulch generously, we ave 12 bags left over, which we will happily return.  Now, we will see over the next few years how the mulch maintains!
reviews.author: Bon

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: We used this for all of our recent landscaping under our flowerpots and raised beds, it covers well and unlike the stone we used before I have not had a single weed or blade of grass come up in the middle of it, we have also had a few good wind storms and haven't had more than one or two pieces blown out onto the sidewalk. Love this stuff.
reviews.author: Christopher

reviews.title: "The best rubber mulch... I'll tell you why."
reviews.text: We have been searching for a long term solution to our landscaping. Every year it is the same thing. Spend hours removing old pine straw and replacing with new only for it to look faded within months. Leaves and such get trapped in pine straw so you cant really preserve the cleanliness of your work. In comes rubberific. We bought 10 bags initially to try in a small bed around an arbor. Installation was a breeze. Light bags, easy spreadability and very, very little debris to pick out. We found a few paper label barcodes and that was it. It is shredded so it looks just like wood mulch. So far two people have had no clue it's rubber.Now on to the reason this brand is worth the extra money spent. 1) they only use industrial tires which means there is no metal and no string. Think about it... Other brands have string. How is a piece of fabric going to retain its color while baking in the sun or being washed in the rain for years? My thought is it doesn't. 2) it's appearance is super realistic. All the pieces lay flat and settle just like wood mulch. Other brands aren't shredded as well, or are nuggets. No thank you. 3) the non toxic guarantee.
reviews.author: Bursy

reviews.title: "Love this mulch!"
reviews.text: I love this mulch!  I spread 50 bags of regular mulch in my planting area.  I put this close to my house and around plants in other parts of my yard.  I plan on replacing all of the wood mulch with this next year!  It seems like a lot of money but when you see how long that it lasts and the man hours that it will saveâ€”well worth it!
reviews.author: Dianne

reviews.title: "so far so good"
reviews.text: we bought this product, not only to add lasting color to our flowerbeds, but also because a neighbor has a cat that he leaves out and it like to use our flowerbeds as a litter box. The color is very nice and the cat seems to not like the beds any more.
reviews.author: JJPJ

reviews.title: "Looks JUST like the real thing"
reviews.text: Overall thrilled with everything about this except for the price. However, if it pays for itself in 4 years, then I'm well ahead. Smells like rubber for maybe the first week and then that's it. It's amazing how real it looks even when you hold it in you hand. I ordered over 100 bags and am hoping to not have to mulch for a decade. Some things I learned: 1) There are different dye lots. Don't assume dark brown is dark brown. I bought the remainder of the pallet at our local store and when I went back the next pallet definitely had more a a reddish tinge to it. When you're spreading in the shade you can't tell, but then the sun comes out and it looked like two slightly different products. I was not happy about that. Just beware. I put landscape fabric down and it spreads much better and evenly. After 2 months the furry woodland creatures around the house have dug into it a few times. 1" is minimally sufficient, but I have found you need to buy extra to go back and cover exposed sites once it settles in. I would plan on buying 2-5 extra bags depending on your job. It did wash away around some downspouts, but it doesn't float away like you might think. Bags are light and easy to carry around. Stop waiting. Bite the bullet on the price and buy it! Great product and MUCH better than any other rubber mulch product on the market. I've looked at them ALL!!
reviews.author: indyallen

reviews.title: "Nice looking mulch. Good value."
reviews.text: Some of the pieces are not properly cut and a little longl but over all this is nice looking mulch. It was a little rubbery smelling coming out of the bag. Rubber mulch lasts a long time so it is a good value after the initial investment. I recommend having a couple of bags in you garage to top off in years to come for a good color match. Some mulch will  be scattered over time so you need to top it off- but nothing like with real wood mulch that turns to dirt. I would not put it over edible plants, but fine for flowers and landscaping. If you hate mulching- this is the product for you.
reviews.author: mrsjpjp

reviews.title: "Like!"
reviews.text: Good texture, easy spreading, great coveragle. After the first rain down pour the product still looks fresh and remains in place.
reviews.author: Gerri

reviews.title: "RED RUBBER MULCH"
reviews.text: i DO LIKE THIS PRODUCT, THE COLOR DOES NOT FADE, IT LOOKS LIKE MULCH, i HAVE IT INFRONT OF MY HOUSE BY MY FRONT PORCH, i BOUGHT MY FIRST BATCH ABOUT THREE YRS AGO, i ADD TWO BAGS EVERY YR. i AM VERY PLEASED.
reviews.author: DAGG

reviews.title: "Petroleum on my flower beds"
reviews.text: I used rubber mulch and a couple yrs later noticed my plants werent doing so well. Spoke with agriculture dept at university and was told ot is petroleum and effects your soil. So even though it stays nice ot was killing my soil and then my plants
reviews.author: Georgie

reviews.title: "I love this stuff!"
reviews.text: This rubber mulch is more expensive than traditional mulch, but I replace a lot less every year. The bags are lighter and easier to handle (even when wet).
reviews.author: TLCMom

reviews.title: "Beautiful Mulch!"
reviews.text: I, like many others, was tired of my mulch looking drab and having to be replaced every year. I read these reviews & then went to Lowe's to see the actual product.I was amazed at how "real" it looks. I decided to make the switch and bought 30 bags.It's easy to put down (lightweight bags are easy for a woman to handle), looks amazing, and the rubber smell faded after a few days. You won't be disappointed with this purchase!
reviews.author: ilxtech

reviews.title: "Waste of Money"
reviews.text: Although the concept is a great idea, and the mulch appearance is fantastic, I would not recommend this product.  I laid down over 30 bags at a cost of over $300 last fall,and the mulch garden looks terrible.  This material is lighter tna real mulch, so it fails to pack down.  The slightest movement of air or water pushes the mulch around in clumps leaving bare spots.  It even blows around from strong winds.  Although this is supposed to be a cost savings long term because it lasts "forever", it will end up costing you more in the long run.  I will have to buy more bags already to fill in the bare spots.
reviews.author: Professor

reviews.title: "Appearance"
reviews.text: This is by far the best rubber mulch I have purchased. The previous rubber mulch was more like bark and after using this one I'll never go back to anything else. If it wasn't so expensive I would put it all around my house where I have red mulch right now.
reviews.author: Kent

reviews.title: "best looking"
reviews.text: i love the way it looks and was so easy to install,i put it in my kids play area and they love it too.i bought over 100 bags and still havent found one piece of wire or metal.
reviews.author: dad with kids

reviews.title: "rubber mulch"
reviews.text: We used to use the wood mulch but now we use rubber. We have used it for 3 years. Threre is no color fade and it does not let weeds through if you put it down right. It is long lasting and less time consuming removing wood mulch each year.
reviews.author: jackofallmasterofnone

reviews.title: "Been using for years, amazing product"
reviews.text: I use the red color that is so vibrant. I also used regular mulch that had to be replaced every year. I'm in my 60's and have rheumatoid arthritis so it's so much easier to lift the bags and spread the product than the bark mulch. People can't believe it's rubber when they see my gardens which I'm on the main walking route in our town. Don't hesitate to buy this product, it's amazing,
reviews.author: Gabby2me

reviews.title: "Rubberifis Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: Product is ok but you can tell it discolored. Bought during summer on sale and didn't use this December...slight discoloration/lighter more gray than black. My biggest dislike is the .8 cu ft bags...too little product for the price. Also bought black wood mulch for other areas in my yard...will stick with it in the future for color, costs and amount in bag.
reviews.author: mrsblue

reviews.title: "great investment"
reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS WONDERFUL. LOOKS GREAT AND IS RECYCLED MATERIAL. ALSO, IF IT LAST AS LONG AS THEY SAY, IT WILL PAY FOR ITSELF IN TIME. NOT SORRY AT ALL.
reviews.author: NANA

reviews.title: "Nice product, BUT..."
reviews.text: The rubber mulch is really nice to work with and it looks great. However, the bags are only .08 cubic feet. One bag is $10.00. The regular mulch is 2 cubic feet per bag, for $4.00 - $5.00 each. Quite a difference. So, if you have lots of money, buy the rubber mulch.In fairness, it is a better product, and is guaranteed not to discolor for number of years, so you may be saving money in the long run. It's just a lot of money all at one time to buy this.
reviews.author: Connie

reviews.title: "Best. Mulch. Ever."
reviews.text: I will never use another mulch again.  This stuff is awesome!  It doesn't float, if you don't have gutters, the force of the water hitting it will push it.
reviews.author: SJ

reviews.title: "Best Mulch Ever"
reviews.text: So happy we made this purchase. The Black Shredded Rubber Mulch looks like real wood mulch. The bags are not heavy and the cost is worth every penny. We will not have to mulch again for a couple of years! We are a VERY HAPPY Age 65+ Couple. Thanks Rubberific!!
reviews.author: BILLYSHIRL

reviews.title: "Great  product"
reviews.text: Great product, however it's very lite and you need to place in a boarder.Wind can dispurse easy.
reviews.author: Denis

reviews.title: "Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: After several hard rains this has stayed in place without washing or looking like more needs to be added.  Really glad I went with this over the cypress.  It has eased my concerns with termites, it's cleaner then the cypress, no staining and no smell. I haven't seen any cats digging in it for a litter box.  Only a few weeks in, but so far I am please!
reviews.author: Me

reviews.title: "Very pleased"
reviews.text: Have to say I am very satisfied how it came out.  Also received many compliments.
reviews.author: Louieb

reviews.title: "Nice Mulch for Indoors"
reviews.text: I decided to go with the rubber mulch for an indoor project. Turned out great.
reviews.author: Chris

reviews.title: "Holds color and moisture very well."
reviews.text: It holds it's color year after year.  I have had several bags for approximately 4 years and it looks like new.  I purchased more to fill in some more areas.  It also hold moisture, the flowers really like it.
reviews.author: keithdal

reviews.title: "Rubberific Shredded Rubber Mulch is Expensive"
reviews.text: The Rubberific Shredded Rubber Mulch is a high quality, good looking alternative to to natural bark and pine straw. I have every reason to believe that this shredded mulch will maintain its color for many years. The only problem is the price. If you are set on using shredded mulch that will last a long time, this is the way to go, However, there is a "chunk" version of this mulch that looks like chunks of bark available for half the price. If you are doing a 700 square foot job, the cost differential will add up quickly.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Love this mulch!"
reviews.text: To make your flower colors pop, the dark brown shredded rubber mulch is perfect! It is also great for long term use versus buying mulch every year, as you simply rake it up and then put it back down again over your flower bed. It is also great for deterring pests and it is reclaimed, which is great for the environment.
reviews.author: BeachLady

reviews.title: "Totally pleased!"
reviews.text: So far I am totally impressed with this product. Looks great, you can't even tell it's rubber until you pick it up. It does have a bit of a rubber smell even though its been down for a week now, but it's very tolerable. Even our friends and neighbors think it looks great. They didn't believe me when I told them it was the Rubberific mulch. Only time will tell if it's worth the price! If it doesn't fade or blow away and saves me from mulching for the next 4-5 years then it's well worth the money!
reviews.author: Jennifer

reviews.title: "Brown bags do not match"
reviews.text: Brown bags of mulch are not the same color. Dumped 10 bags out ($100) and 3/4 are a deep black (not a color sold). The others brown. Flower bed looks terrible. Went to Menards and picked up rubber mulch at half the price to cover up the product defect. And buyer beware: Lowe's will not stand behind the purchase of this if it is not matching in color.
reviews.author: Skeena

reviews.title: "Expensive but good"
reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Tony

reviews.title: "Eh at best"
reviews.text: This rubber mulch was the best option at Lowe's so we purchased it. The whole bag BARELY cover anything and you need a TON to do even a small area. The bag of pieces were so all over the place and we got huge chunks all the way to about a foot long string like piece to the normal sized ones. It looks awful unless I personally go and find these ones and hide them underneath the rest. I wouldn't buy these again and will be looking for other options.
reviews.author: KBlake

reviews.title: "Looks great"
reviews.text: Just put it down and it looks great just like regular mulch. I have to say it smells like rubber, I hope the smell wears off soon. It seemed to cover a lot better than wood mulch and I am just going have to wait and see how long the color last. Right now the color is great but only time will tell. I don't like the price but if you only have to replace it every 10 to 12 years than it's worth it. I caught it on sale regular it's almost $10 a bag and I got it for $8 a bag so that was a plus.
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "So realistic looking!"
reviews.text: After reading reviews from virtually every product and store online, I finally decided that this was the one to try. I will actually need a couple of the huge palettes, but decided to try one bag first. I was not disappointed! Dark brown color looks just like the tinted natural mulch I have bought in past years. Maybe the smallest hint of red in the sunlight. It spreads super easily and doesn't have any awkward looking big chunks. You have to pick it up, look closely and bend it before you realize it's rubber and not natural. Exactly the look I was going for. It's going to be expensive to replace multiple cubic yards worth, but I'm thinking about the long term savings. I also love that I won't have to be trucking it across my yard every spring. Wish it was less expensive, but still a great product!
reviews.author: IndyAllen

reviews.title: "So realistic looking!"
reviews.text: After reading reviews from virtually every product and store online, I finally decided that this was the one to try. I will actually need a couple of the huge palettes, but decided to try one bag first. I was not disappointed! Dark brown color looks just like the tinted natural mulch I have bought in past years. Maybe the smallest hint of red in the sunlight. It spreads super easily and doesn't have any awkward looking big chunks. You have to pick it up, look closely and bend it before you realize it's rubber and not natural. Exactly the look I was going for. It's going to be expensive to replace multiple cubic yards worth, but I'm thinking about the long term savings. I also love that I won't have to be trucking it across my yard every spring. Wish it was less expensive, but still a great product!
reviews.author: IndyAllen

reviews.title: "size"
reviews.text: Size of bag covers very little.  Very expensive also for size. Cannot rake leaves or anything off of it so it has to be replaced often
reviews.author: mimi

reviews.title: "It works well no replacing"
reviews.text: It fades a little in color over the years but it is good looking and easy to spread
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Better than mulching every year!"
reviews.text: Just purchased this product for the first time; immediately came home and spread it out; love the weight of the bags which were very manageable and curb appeal is lovely. Might seem pricey but considering you wont have to purchase wood mulch again next season, nor for 10 seasons, this option is cheaper. Put down 20 bags and headed to get 60 more. My mulching days are over for a while.
reviews.author: Nora

reviews.title: "A Mulch Worth Buying!"
reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this mulch! It works great, looks wonderful and LASTS! Definitely worth the extra cost.
reviews.author: KSHunter

reviews.title: "missed rubber"
reviews.text: great product but looks like quality control needs to step up. alot of big unshredded rubber pieces that stand out as am eye soreif they correct this problem it will be a 5 star.
reviews.author: greatdane

reviews.title: "Mulching made effortless"
reviews.text: I've used this product for 2 years now. It maintains it's color well and does not break down. Yes, it is 3x as expensive as regular mulch, but once you do it, you never have to do it again.
reviews.author: PittsburghDIYer

reviews.title: "Great looking very functional"
reviews.text: I was very happy with Lowe's online ordering & delivery serviceI had never used their system before & was a little nervous about itI am a professional landscaper & when things don't get delivered on time it costs us money but everything went as planned. The driver called ahead to let me know he was on his way.Top ratingWill definitely use this service on other jobs
reviews.author: CUrlyone

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Was quite pleased with this mulch. Have had multiple problems with artillery mold spores so am trying the rubber mulch. It was easy to work with & the lighter weight pkg. made it possible for me to handle it myself. The color is great & though it has only been down a month, it still looks wonderful. It doesn't wash out in the rain or get blown around. I am anxious to see how it looks after more time passes. All in all, a great product!
reviews.author: Cici

reviews.text: I recently baught 60 bags of shredded rubber mulch. I do not have a lot of extra time so I thought I'd by rubber so it only has to be done once! There was pieces of trash in almost every bag. So after laying mulch I had to then pick out all the trash. Candy wraps and plastic pieces. I was very disappointed!!!!
reviews.author: AJ

reviews.title: "Horrible! DO NOT BUY."
reviews.text: I purchased a significant amount of this mulch from Lowes and it has been nothing but problems.  The mulch has faded over time, looks dirty all the time, and looks horrible compared to other mulch.  Also, the manufacturer of the mulch provided virtually no assistance will my negative experience.  DO NOT BUY.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "good bug prop"
reviews.text: too expensive for the amount you get.
reviews.author: fritz

reviews.title: "GREAT Product!"
reviews.text: It's a rich brown and I love that it looks like shredded wood, but won't blow away. I'm hopeful it will also deture bugs from getting on my plants because the don't like the rubber material, smell, whateve it takes! It also looks beautiful and makes the garden look very lush.
reviews.author: Dstone911

reviews.title: "Best mulch ever!"
reviews.text: I layed this product two months ago in the bolstering hot Texas heat and its done great color wise. No fading, no packing down and weeds dont seem to grow in it! Definate must buy!
reviews.author: Jt285701

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: I pulled all of the pine straw in front of my house and put this in last year. This year, I caught it on sale and purchased more for the back yard and to cover a few thin spots in front. I already covered the thin spots and see no difference between the old and new mulch. The looks are great. I searched around for different brands and everything else I found looks like old tires, some are only have colored as well. I have had to physically grab a hand full to show some people that it was rubber and not wood.The only down side is the price. It is costly for the initial investment, but I believe it to be worth it in the long run. If I can get just 4 years out of it, I'll be ahead in price. The saving of a soar back not having to redo it every year makes it worth it as well.
reviews.author: Stuart

reviews.title: "Rubberific Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: The Rubberific Rubbber mulch is the best on the market, it is pricey at $10 a bag. The Black rubber mulch is my favorite, It gives the garden a pop! the black rubber mulch is extremely hard to get, it is not available at any Lowes or Costco in my home state of Connecticut. at all! I have had to have my Neice who has a home in Pennsylvania stop in new jersey to grab some bags for me. Please Lowes tell me in what store in Connecticut that I can pick up bags of the Rubberific shredded Rubber mulch?
reviews.author: BigDre

reviews.title: "Rubber mulch"
reviews.text: Wood mulch is food for termites and other insects. This rubber mulch is a great alternative to wood. I also put down a layer of 8-mil black poly to prevent weeds from coming up. It's been over a year now and it's working good.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Good but Expensive"
reviews.text: Bags are smaller and more expensive than wood mulch but it lasts a long time and looks good. I started using this mulch in 2010. Most years I will add a few bags to replace what I mane have raked up or blown away. Stuff that is 8 years old still looks new. Currently at my local Lowe's premium hardwood is $3.66 for 2 cf and this mulch is $9.97 for .8 cf (almost $25 for 2 cf), but I'm happy.
reviews.author: SteveP

reviews.title: "Looks great - better than I expected"
reviews.text: I put this mulch down in my landscape bed next to the porch. It looks great. My husband didn't believe me at first when I told him it was rubber.  Other reviewers have reported a smell, but I only sensed a very faint odor when I first put it down. It's been a couple of weeks now and the there is no smell at all. I had been wanting to switch from traditional shredded mulch because of the many negatives I've learned about it. None of the other alternatives, like stone and compost, appealed to me. I don't think I'd be good with stone because I don't like using herbicides and I think grass and weeds would grow up through it (I don't really know --haven't tried it). Compost is expensive and I don't know if it would hold its color very well.With the shredded rubber mulch, I'm very happy to be able to put old tires to use, it looks great, and it is keeping grass and weeds out of my landscaped beds.
reviews.author: Laura

reviews.title: "Great for a raised bed garden surround"
reviews.text: I have six raised bed garden beds in an enclosed area. It's very pretty with a garden table and 2 chairs, topiary , gazing ball and flower pots. When the area was first assembled four years ago, I didn't want to put down wood mulch inbetween those raised beds and have to replace it each year. So, I spent the big $ and used the brown rubber mulch. Underneath the rubber mulch, I had the guy first lay down the landscape cloth and put the mulch on top of it. I don't put the mulch where plants are (like inside the raised beds). It is perfect! Once a year, I may buy a couple of bags to patch up where leaf blowing may have dispersed some of the mulch outside the garden area. But, it's a whole lot cheaper in the long run to use the rubber mulch. It has held up well with no decay that I can see.
reviews.author: susie

reviews.title: "Attractive Rubber Mulch"
reviews.text: This lightweight and easy to handle mulch is best used in smaller areas due to the high cost.  It can be used next to foundations or wood structures without attracting insects.  The mulch looks nice as applied, and time will tell if the color and appearance are lasting.
reviews.author: S

reviews.title: "Disappointing color does not match"
reviews.text: Last year we bought 25 brown bags BUT looked black. This year we bought 5 more brown bags to spruce up the garden . BUT this year the mulch looks brown not black.. This product does not come in black so I cannot match the other mulch. Also it does float and it does nothing for the weeds. We invested a lot of money on mulch that does not work and the mismatch color is a mess.Very disappointed!!!
reviews.author: BKGG

reviews.title: "Best mulch ever"
reviews.text: I love this mulch. It looks great. Easy to use and now I won't have to think about it for many years to come.
reviews.author: ME

reviews.title: "Great substitute for bark mulch"
reviews.text: This stuff is great mulch! Lasts longer and is easy to apply. Price is a little high, but still worth it!
reviews.author: Kevinoregon

reviews.title: "easy to use and looks great!"
reviews.text: I ordered 15 bags to start off with and loved it so much I ordered 30 more bags, but they have not yet arrived.
reviews.author: woody

reviews.title: "Red rubber mulch"
reviews.text: I recommend ref rubber mulch.  It is heavy enough to withstand careful blower activity to remove leaves, etc and it is fade resistant so I add to it after blowing the leaves out a couple times per year.  It is a little pricey compared to others but it is higher quality than other rubber mulch and looks better.  It is well worth the difference.
reviews.author: TedfromTampa

reviews.title: "Impulse Buy, Going to buy more!"
reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this product. Durable, doesn't attrack bugs, looks good!
reviews.author: JelyMc

reviews.title: "Good product"
reviews.text: Looks just like natural mulch and so far has stayed in place. We intend to replace all of our beds with this eventually. We hesitated due to how expensive it was compared to natural mulches and were afraid it might look like old tires chopped up but we were pleasantly surprised.
reviews.author: 2605pt

reviews.title: "Glad I found this."
reviews.text: Great in the flower beds. Looks nice, easy to put down. I want more.
reviews.author: distressed

reviews.title: "Rubberific shredded rubber"
reviews.text: Used this for walkways in front and rear yards with 12" square blocks for stepping stones and in the play area under the kids' swingset. Very attractive and durable, hold color fairly well. Hard downpours of rain may cause it to move location. 2nd time I've bought and used this. Fairly expensive. Wish it were about $3 cheaper per bag.
reviews.author: 88Lobo

reviews.text: Replacing all wood mulch, with the rubber mulch. love it
reviews.author: genosgirl41

reviews.title: "Looks Real"
reviews.text: The mulch looks like real mulch. Appears to eliminate/reduce insects and South FL lizards from the garden. Did not change color after heavy rain. Winds did not blow or scatter it around. Except for the price, great product. Eight cubic feet does not go very far; so the co$t adds up with the purchase of several bags. I put brown plastic tablecloths on the ground, and the Rubberific mulch on top and, No More Weeds!!!! Also the environmentalist in me loves using a recycled product.
reviews.author: BrowardHome

reviews.title: "Worth the time and monetary investment."
reviews.text: This product performs as described. The color was very uniform from bag to bag. This product is very attractive, I have had two people so far think it is dyed mulch, once they handle it they are impressed that it comes from shredded auto tires. Take your time to maximize coverage spread it by hand for the final install.
reviews.author: tazzhd

reviews.title: "Rubber Mulch SHREDS"
reviews.text: My husband bought this product by mistake instead of the Rubber Mulch NUGGETS.  We opened the first bag without really examining his purchase.  Needless to say, we were shocked at the slivers of mulch that poured out of the bag.  Two bags of it hardly covered a fraction on the space that rubber nuggets cover.  We drove to a Lowe's in a city 30 miles away to get the nugget variety.  Our two local Lowe's do not carry the nuggets that we have used for many years.  I couldn't believe that neither of them stocked this amazing product.  Nugget mulch is the best thing since slice bread!  Well anyway, I do not recommend the shredded rubber mulch.
